import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react' //import { GlobalContext } from '../context/GlobalContext' import { useMutation } from '@apollo/react-hooks'; import { addProductQuery } from '../queries' export default function AddProduct() { //const { addProduct } = useContext(GlobalContext) const [name, setName] = useState('') const [price, setPrice] = useState(0) const [category, setCategory] = useState('Health') const [shortDesc, setShortDesc] = useState('') const [description, setDescription] = useState('') const [addProduct, { data }] = useMutation(addProductQuery, { variables: { name, price, category, shortDesc, description } }); console.log('XXX: ') const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() //const newProduct = { name, price, category, shortDesc, description } addProduct() setName('') setPrice(0) setCategory('Health') setShortDesc('') setDescription('') } return (
{ setName(e.target.value) }} />
{ setPrice(e.target.value) }} />
{ setShortDesc(e.target.value) }} />
) }
